sentences.en: In the end, it presents the general process of developing a federate according to the code.
sentences.cn: 最后结合代码介绍了用RTI开发联邦成员的一般过程.

sentences.en: Problem of crosscutting federate could be resolved effectively by using Aspect - Oriented programming technology.
sentences.cn: 利用面向方面的编程技术,能够有效地解决邦员的横切问题.

sentences.en: The basic situation and federate structure of the warfare simulation based on HLA are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了HLA作战仿真的基本情况及其联邦结构.

sentences.en: The Bridge Federate is a feasible solution to achieve multi - federations interconnection.
sentences.cn: 基于桥接成员实现多联邦互连是目前较为通用和可行的方法.

sentences.en: The simulation engine ( SE ) is the most important federate among the federations based on HLA.
sentences.cn: 仿真引擎作为仿真系统的核心,是HLA仿真联邦中的特殊联邦成员.

sentences.en: Using the Bridge Federate is one of the approaches to interconnect HLA multiple federations.
sentences.cn: 实现多联邦互连有多种方法,桥接成员是其中一种.

trans.tran_en: if a group of states federate, they join together to form a federation
